price: Hakika kwa Mola wako Mlezi ndio marejeo.
footnotes: Ewe Muhammad! Hakika ni kwa Mola wako Mlezi peke yake ndiyo yako marejeo ya wote kwa kufufuliwa na kulipwa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
